input.description: host name who's connection details need to be extracted.

output.description:
Connection details based on the connection details concept.
Sample: <connection-details> <adapter-name/> <hostname/> <username/> <password/> <invocation-mechanism/> </connection-details>

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.) = 'true' and string('${isIP}') = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string('${isIP}') = 'true'" /> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after(., '.')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string('${isIP}') = 'true'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(substring-before(., ".")) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before(., ".")" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <connection-details> <xsl:if test="//connection-details/*[local-name() = 'password']"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//connection-details/password/*"> <xsl:copy-of select="//connection-details/password/." /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <password> <xsl:value-of select="//connection-details/password/." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </password> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//connection-details/*[local-name() = 'username']"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//connection-details/*[local-name()='username']"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//connection-details/username/*"> <xsl:copy-of select="//connection-details/username/." /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <username> <xsl:value-of select="//connection-details/username/." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </username> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:if> <xsl:copy-of select="//connection-details/*[local-name() != 'username' and local-name() != 'password']" /> <xsl:if test="string-length('${adapter name}') > 0"> <adapter-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${adapter name}</xsl:text> </adapter-name> </xsl:if> </connection-details> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflows extracts the connection details of a given host based on the module configuration.
